snippet: An owner with a horse in the Santa Anita Derby, a prep race for the Kentucky Derby, has offered to pay for enhanced security to ensure Saturday’s race is run fairly and to provide transparency.
abstract: Horses competing at Santa Anita Derby will remain under surveillance for 72 hours before race, as Golden Eagle Farm becomes first owner to pay for enhanced security to ensure fair race and transparency to bettors.
lead_paragraph: An owner with a horse in the Santa Anita Derby, a prep race for the Kentucky Derby, has offered to pay for enhanced security to ensure Saturday’s race is run fairly and to provide transparency.

headline.seo: Horses Running at Santa Anita Will Be Under Surveillance
